title: Primož Roglič Confirms He Will Leave Jumbo-Visma
content:
Giro d'Italia and former Vuelta a España champion calls time on eight-year stay at Jumbo-Visma: 'I can definitely confirm I will leave'

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Confirms He Will Leave Jumbo-Visma on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
